description: A set of tools for processing and manipulating structured data formats like JSON, CSV, and SQL.
explanation: This plugin provides commands to parse, query, and transform data from various sources, which is a critical capability for data analysis, reporting, and many other complex tasks.

inputDefinitions.name: json_object
inputDefinitions.description: The JSON object to query. Used with 'query_json'.

inputDefinitions.name: expression
inputDefinitions.description: The JSONPath expression to use. Used with 'query_json'.

inputDefinitions.name: json_string
inputDefinitions.description: The JSON string to validate. Used with 'validate_json'.

inputDefinitions.name: csv_data
inputDefinitions.description: The CSV data as a string. Used with 'csv_to_json'.

inputDefinitions.name: json_data
inputDefinitions.description: A JSON array of objects. Used with 'json_to_csv' and 'execute_sql_on_json'.

inputDefinitions.name: sql_query
inputDefinitions.description: The SQL query to execute on the JSON data. Used with 'execute_sql_on_json'.

outputDefinitions.name: result
outputDefinitions.description: The result of the data operation. The structure depends on the operation performed.
